PEC: Send the PDF Report by PEC
NETWORK_PACKET_CAPTURE_STARTED_DETAILS: Capture loop has been started in a new thread!
NETWORK_PACKET_CAPTURE_COMPLETED_DETAILS: Loop has been stopped and .pcap file has been saved in the case folder
PACKET_CAPTURE_ERROR:
An error occurred during network packets acquisition!
See bellow for more detail.
SCREEN_RECORDER_STARTED_DETAILS: recorder loop has been started in a new thread!
SCREEN_RECORDER_COMPLETED_DETAILS: Loop has been stopped and .avi file has been saved in the case folder
SCREEN_RECORDER_ERROR_MSG:
An error occurred during screen recorder acquisition!
See bellow for more detail.
MALFORMED_URL_ERROR: Malformed URL: missing Network Location part.
HTTP_CONNECTION_ERROR:
Error during the HTTP request!
See bellow for more detail.
NSLOOKUP_EXECUTION_ERROR:
Error during NSLOOKUP execution!
See bellow for more detail.
SSLCERTIFICATE_NOT_EXIST: CERTIFICATE SSL don't exist on URL: {}
SSLCERTIFICATE_CONNECTION_ERROR: Error during SSL connection or while retrieving the SSL CERTIFICATE.
SSLCERTIFICATE_SAVING_CERTIFICATE_ERROR:
Exception while saving SSL CERTIFICATE!
See bellow for more detail.
TRACEROUTE_EXECUTION_ERROR:
Error during TRACEROUTE execution!
See bellow for more detail.
WHOIS_DNS_RESOLUTION_ERROR:
DNS resolution error
See below for more details.
WHOIS_INVALID_DOMAIN_ERROR: Invalid domain or domain extraction failed.
WHOIS_EXECUTION_ERROR:
Error during WHOIS execution!
See bellow for more detail.
HASHFILE: Calculate HASH of the acquired files
CALCULATE_HASHFILE_STARTED: Calculate HASH of the acquired files started
CALCULATE_HASHFILE_COMPLETED: Calculate HASH of the acquired files completed
CALCULATE_HASHFILE: Calculation of the HASH of the acquired files
